title: Man accidentally shoots self in groin in North Park
content:
Autoplay:Man shot in groinCONNECTING...
SAN DIEGO — San Diego Police are responding to a report of a man who has been shot in the groin in North Park on Monday morning.
10News photojournalist Paul Anderegg reports that a female passenger of the vehicle the man was driving on Herman Street south of Landis Street said the shooting was an accidental discharge.
The man was transported by ambulance to a hospital.
